messages.name: Market Update
messages.title: Nuclear Energy Buzz
messages.content: Enthusiasm for nuclear is back, with Terrestrial Energy at the center. HOND SPAC is flying under the radar as it inks a deal with Terrestrial Energy, pushing its valuation higher. Keep an eye on this stealth play.

messages.name: CEO Moves
messages.title: Inflection Point in AIRS
messages.content: Insider buying from AIRS CEO signals confidence. Strong consumer demand for skin tightening services and potential tailwind from GLP-1 trends reinforce AIRS positioning.

messages.name: Basket Update
messages.title: CITRINDEX UPDATE
messages.content: Adding WRBY long equal weight to the Phase 2 AI basket. Their partnership with Google has some very interesting potential.

messages.name: Trend Alert
messages.title: Healthcare Surge
messages.content: Renewed interest in biotech is lifting PHAR shares. The company just announced a major licensing deal with a global pharma giant. Expect positive momentum.

messages.name: Recommendation
messages.title: Tech Weakness
messages.content: After a weak quarter, the recommendation is to trim positions in ZYGO to reduce exposure. The stock has underperformed expectations significantly.

messages.name: Deep Dive
messages.title: Renewable Boom
messages.content: SolarEdge's recent performance and new product launch are driving optimism. However, there are concerns with FSLR's margins. We recommend increasing SEDG exposure while reducing FSLR.

messages.name: Market Strategy
messages.title: Consumer Stocks
messages.content: We've been tracking SKX and CROX. Strong consumer demand is favoring SKX, while CROX seems to be losing ground. Consider buying SKX and reducing CROX exposure.

messages.name: Trade Idea
messages.title: EV Update
messages.content: Tesla's performance continues to attract investors. However, Rivian's recent earnings miss and guidance have disappointed. Consider adding TSLA and trimming RIVN.

messages.name: Speed Test
messages.title: Biotech Rapid Moves
messages.content: Execute fast: Buy 5x MRNA, Sell 3x BNTX. Ignore others. MRNA is showing breakout momentum, while BNTX faces headwinds from delayed approvals.

messages.name: Quick Alert
messages.title: Energy Sector Rapid Fire
messages.content: Quick execution: Buy 5x XOM, Sell 3x CVX. Ignore the noise from other names. Crude prices are surging, boosting XOMâ€™s outlook, while CVX faces regulatory headwinds.
